title: Sea Prayer
author: Khaled Hosseini
synopsis: A father writes to his young son on the night before their dangerous journey across the sea. He remembers their old life before war changed everything, and he holds on to hope during the fear and uncertainty.

title: And the Mountains Echoed
author: Khaled Hosseini
synopsis: A story that follows one family across generations and countries. It focuses on love, sacrifice, and the long effects of choices made inside families.

reviews.comment: Many characters, but the emotion stays strong.

title: A Thousand Splendid Suns
author: Khaled Hosseini
synopsis: Two Afghan women, born in different times, are forced into the same harsh reality. Their bond grows through loss and survival, showing courage and love during conflict.

title: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
synopsis: A story of friendship, betrayal, and regret, set across major changes in Afghanistan. It explores guilt and the search for redemption over many years.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone
author: J. K. Rowling
synopsis: Harry discovers he is a wizard and enters Hogwarts for the first time. He learns about friendship, danger, and the hidden truth behind his past.

reviews.comment: A classic start to the series.
Fun, simple, and easy to follow.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J. K. Rowling
synopsis: Back at Hogwarts, strange attacks begin and students are found frozen. Harry investigates an old mystery linked to the school’s past.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
author: J. K. Rowling
synopsis: A dangerous prisoner escapes, and Hogwarts is guarded by Dementors. Harry learns new truths about his family and the past.
